about_the_game:
V1.0 official version

As promised, the game was officially completed in early November^^ More refined pixel animations, easier gameplay, and fewer bugs.

【 Complete Content: Prologue+Street Chapter+Dream Demon Street Chapter 】

H animation: 14 pieces

Scenario: 13

Ending: 2

2D horizontal pixel ACT - can a Blood Clan girl also become a Paladin? Now it's here!

In the game, you will play the role of a blood race girl who unfortunately reincarnates into a different world! Not only with silver hair and red pupils, but also a young lady from a prestigious family.

In his past life, he passed away as a otaku, but now he is fortunate enough to be reborn with a gaming system, and his wealth, power, and reputation are within reach.

Helpless... due to inheriting the LV from the game MAX Paladin class, as long as you get a little excited, you will immediately enter the Sage state.

So, in order to relieve loneliness, you dress up every night and linger in the sweet and tempting adult street - Mengmo Street.

However, due to frequent visits to Dream Street, I unknowingly owe 100000 gold coins!

At this moment, the protagonist appears before him as an extremely evil and vicious female ghost demon with an extremely bad personality

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/02.png

{Miscellaneous Fish~Miscellaneous Fish~If you can't pay off the debt of 100000 gold coins within a month, just obediently become Big Sister's plaything~}

Faced with the protagonist of the female ghost demon... angry!

Pay off 100000 gold coins within 1 month and conquer the succubus!

Or is it unable to pay off the debt and become a toy for the succubus?

Everything depends on your choices and efforts within these 30 days!

[Game features]

1. Control the cute female protagonist and explore the beautiful world of the other world

2. Date and stamina system.

3. Through processes in the game, many H events can be unlocked and gold coin rewards can be obtained

4. Replacement system

5. Unique mini games within the game

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages, or it may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace. This game includes nude or sexual content, and involuntary sex.
All characters are over 20 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The protagonist who did not exit the game when it was about to be shut down unexpectedly reincarnated into a different world with the system after the game was shut down. The girl who lingers on Dream Street every night ultimately owes the Demon a huge sum of 100000 gold coins.
